pandora-error: Title of error pages displayed when the skin template is invalid.
pandora-invalid-partial: Error message displayed when the skin template contains an invalid partial. $1 is the name of the skin template, $2 is the name of the invalid partial.
pandora-missing-partial: Error message displayed when the skin template contains a non-existent partial. $1 is the name of the skin template, $2 is the name of the partial, $3 is the filename being compiled.
pandora-need-js: Error message displayed to the user when the skin is not set up and they have javascript disabled.
